titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain power panels specifically designed for wind turbine generators to transfer electric power to and from a utility power grid at 2100 kW at 600 volts with a nominal full load of 2190 amps.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain power panels specifically designed for wind turbine generators to transfer electric power to and from a utility power grid at 2100 kW at 600 volts with a nominal full load of 2190 amps.
